response.original_title: 劇場版 からかい上手の高木さん
response.overview: Takagi and Nishikata’s final summer in junior high is about to begin, and it’s already off to a heartwarming start! When the pair find an abandoned kitten, they decide to work together and take care of Hana, their adorable new companion until they can locate its missing mother.
response.title: Teasing Master Takagi-san: The Movie

titles.title: 映画 からかい上手の高木さん
擅長捉弄人的高木同學劇場版
แกล้งนัก รักนะรู้ยัง? เดอะมูฟวี่
